roleset.name: hit with a thwapping sound

role.descr: instrument, thing thwapping arg 1; answers the question thwapped with what?

example.src: All arguments, sounds like a bad day!
example.name: All arguments, sounds like a bad day!
example.text: Abby again immersed in her org. chem. book, seemingly nonplussed, me thwapping my head against the steering wheel chanting "this isn't happening..."

roleset.note: THWAP-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from thwap.01-v)
